Title: Requires that a member of the Westchester county industrial development agency is a member of the governing body of Westchester county
Summary: Allows that the Westchester county governing body appoint an additional member of the Westchester county industrial development agency.
LawCode: Amd ยง923-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to allowing the governing body of Westchester county to appoint a member of the Westchester county industrial development agency
